Title: 073: How to Stand Out to Recruiters in Data Science
Description:
In this episode of the SuperDataScience Podcast, I chat Founder of Break Into Data Science, Mark Meloon. You will learn how to get into Data Science even without a PhD, take a walk-through of a Data Science interview and learn how to turbo boost your LinkedIn profile.


If you enjoyed this episode, check out show notes, resources, and more at www.superdatascience.com/73
